title: Greasy Glasses
medium: acrylic, colored pencil and graphite on panel
alt: A textured painting showing a pair of smeared eyeglasses over a dark, greasy-looking surface with brown and green tones.

title: Eastern Rain
alt: A painting on light wood with diagonal black slashes across the surface, over a slightly darkened and textured background.

title: Plinian Eruption
alt: An abstract painting on wood showing smoky black marks and smudges against a light brown surface, resembling natural grain patterns.

title: Fire Carried Under A Wheel 3
medium: acrylic, coloredn pencil, and graphite on panel
alt: An abstract wheel structure appears partially submerged in a field of sooty black and scorched red. Marks and smudges suggest a heavy burden carried forward through fire and ruin.

title: Fire As A Sign
medium: acrylic, colored pencil, and graphite on panel
alt: An abstract artwork of a broken wheel form engulfed by smoky gray and white textures, with streaks of fire-like marks.

title: A Wheel Within A Wheel 1
alt: A painting showing two rough eye shapes emerging from layered fields of burnt orange and red textures.

title: Fire Carried Under A Wheel 1
medium: acrylic, colored pencil, and graphite on panel
alt: A dark abstract painting featuring a single small eye in the center of a cave-like opening surrounded by gray and black textures.

title: Fire Carried Under A Wheel 2
medium: acrylic, colored pencil, and graphite on panel
alt: A single wide-set eye emerges from a textured, cavernous opening. Deep shadows and heavy impasto create an atmosphere of hidden watchfulness, vulnerability, and eroded strength.

title: A Wheel Within A Wheel 2
medium: acrylic, colored pencil, and graphite on carved panel
alt: A textured abstract painting featuring a central circle with purple and pink drips, layered over a dark background with yellow and black areas.

title: Looey
alt: A vertical abstract painting suggesting a rough, slumped figure blending into a textured, earth-toned background.

title: Cover Over
medium: archival pigment print mounted on sintra
alt: A vertical photographic composition showing a pixelated, reddish-brown terrain with a curved white section at the bottom edge.

title: Sketch 1
alt: A small painting on wood depicting a rough, dark form resembling a figure, with textured gray, black, and tan surfaces.

title: Steel
alt: A simple geometric sculpture shaped like a flattened hexagon, painted in textured dark gray on a wood surface.

title: Sketch 3
medium: graphite, acrylic and gypsum on panell
alt: A small abstract painting featuring a deep blue and gray cloudy form with sharp black and white geometric shapes at the corners.

title: Sketch 4
medium: Graphite, acrylic and gypsum on panel
alt: A small abstract painting featuring muted tones of gray, green, and tan, with cloudy textures and worn edges on a rectangular wood surface.

title: Sign
medium: acrylic, ink and graphite on panel
alt: An abstract painting on wood showing smoky black marks and smudges against a light brown surface, resembling natural grain patterns.
